sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Three sermons preached by VVilliam Sclater Doctor of Diuinity, and minister of the word of God at Pitmister in Sommersetshire. Now published by his sonne of Kings Colledge in Cambridge Sclater, William, 1575-1626. Sclater, William, 1609-1661.
[8], 16, [8], 17-39, [11], 19, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the blacke Beare, London : 1629.
Edited by William Sclater the younger. "A sermon preached at St. Maries in the Vniversity of Cambridge", "A sermon preached at Tanton in Sommerset", and "A funerall sermon preached at the buriall of the Right Worshipfull Mr. Iohn Colles Esquier" have separate title pages; register is continuous; "A funerall sermon" has separate pagination. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
Three sermons preached by VVilliam Sclater Doctor of Diuinity, and minister of the word of God at Pitmister in Sommersetshire. Now published by his sonne of Kings Colledge in Cambridge Sclater, William, 1575-1626. Sclater, William, 1609-1661.
[8], 16, [8], 17-39, [11], 19, [1] p.
Printed by Thomas Harper for Robert Allot, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the blacke Beare, London : 1629.
Edited by William Sclater the younger. "A sermon preached at St. Maries in the Vniversity of Cambridge", "A sermon preached at Tanton in Sommerset", and "A funerall sermon preached at the buriall of the Right Worshipfull Mr. Iohn Colles Esquier" have separate title pages; register is continuous; "A funerall sermon" has separate pagination. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

his shop in Pauls Church yard at the signe of the blacke Beare
